value.descriptionInPortuguese: Inglês do seu jeito, no seu tempo
value.title: Adults

value.textInPortuguese:
Foco na comunicação oral com gramática estruturada.

 

Você aprende a pensar em inglês, sem recorrer a traduções, e a usar corretamente o vocabulário e estrutura do idioma.
value.textInEnglish:
Focus on oral communication with structured grammar.

 

You learn to think in English, without resorting to translations, and to use the vocabulary and structure of the language correctly.
value.text:
Focus on oral communication with structured grammar.

 

You learn to think in English, without resorting to translations, and to use the vocabulary and structure of the language correctly.
value.description:
*Approximate duration of the course (without holidays, breaks and public holidays).

**It can be 2 days a week or 2 consecutive classes in the same day.
value.firstDescriptionPhrase: *Approximate duration of the course (without holidays, breaks and public holidays).
value.secondDescriptionPhrase: **It can be 2 days a week or 2 consecutive classes in the same day.

specialCoursesCards.descriptionInPortuguese:
Este curso superintensivo é para quem precisa aprender inglês o mais rápido possível. Na modalidade presencial, você conclui 1 módulo em 15 dias. São 3h de aula por dia, 5x por semana.

 

Na modalidade online, você conclui 1 módulo em 23 dias. 2h de aula por dia, 6x por semana.
specialCoursesCards.descriptionInEnglish:
This superintense course is for those who need to learn English as quickly as possible. In the in-person format, a book is concluded in 15 days, with three-hour classes per day, 5 times a week.

 
In the online format, a book is concluded in 23 days, with 2-hour classes per day, 6 times a week.
specialCoursesCards.description:
This superintense course is for those who need to learn English as quickly as possible. In the in-person format, a book is concluded in 15 days, with three-hour classes per day, 5 times a week.

 
In the online format, a book is concluded in 23 days, with 2-hour classes per day, 6 times a week.

specialCoursesCards.descriptionInPortuguese: Além de inglês, o BRASAS também oferece curso de português para estrangeiros. Você aprende a pensar e falar em português através do nosso método original.
specialCoursesCards.descriptionInEnglish: In addition to English, BRASAS also offers a Portuguese course for foreigners. You learn how to think and speak in Portuguese using our original method.
specialCoursesCards.description: In addition to English, BRASAS also offers a Portuguese course for foreigners. You learn how to think and speak in Portuguese using our original method.

specialCoursesCards.descriptionInPortuguese: Uma modalidade desenvolvida para o aluno manter sua fluência oral, com temas atuais e relevantes.
specialCoursesCards.descriptionInEnglish: A type of course developed for students to maintain their fluency, with current and relevant topics.
specialCoursesCards.description: A type of course developed for students to maintain their fluency, with current and relevant topics.

value.title: Special Courses
value.examPreparationText: Find out about the preparatory course and the test application.

**Podem ser 2 dias na semana ou 2 aulas consecutivas no mesmo dia.
